Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Functionary \Func"tion*a*ry\, n.; pl. {Functionaries}. [Cf. F. fonctionnaire.] One charged with the performance of a function or office; as, a public functionary; secular functionaries. [1913 Webster]
functionary n : a worker who holds or is invested with an office [syn: {official}]
